de.rincewind.api.gui.elements.util

Interface ClickBlocker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftClickBlocker

    public interface ClickBlocker
    This class handles the inventory actions (InventoryAction) and decides for an element if this action should be canceled or not. Therefore, you can add ClickAction's, that should be canceled and remove them. As an extra, you can 'lock' the instance. If this instance is locked, all actions will automaticly canceled.
    Since:
    2.3.3
    Author:
    Rincewind34
    See Also:
    Element

        java.util.List<ClickAction> getBlocked()
        Returns all blocked actions.
        Returns:

      • addAction

        void addAction(ClickAction action)
        Adds an action to block to this instance.
        Parameters:
        action - to add

      • removeAction

        void removeAction(ClickAction action)
        Removes an action to block from this instance
        Parameters:
        action - to remove
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the action is null

      • lock

        void lock()
        Locks this instance. If this instance is locked all actions will be blocked automatically. This method does not call addAction(ClickAction) or removeAction(ClickAction).

      • unlock

        void unlock()
        Unlocks this instance. If this instance is locked all actions will be blocked automatically. This method does not call addAction(ClickAction) or removeAction(ClickAction).

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked()
        Returns true if this instance is locked and false if not.
        Returns:
        true if this instance is locked and false if not
